sourcesContent:
<script>
    import playertools from '@/configurator/sketchfab/player'
    import sketchfabdata from '@/configurator/sketchfab/sketchfabdata'

    export default {
        name: 'player',
        components: {},
        props: {},
        computed: {},
        methods: {
            loadScene (sceneuid) {
                playertools.loadScene(sceneuid, sketchfabdata.playersettings).then(api => {
                    playertools.loadSceneCallback(api)
                })
            },
        },
        mounted () {
            this.loadScene(sketchfabdata.sceneuid.production)
        }
    }
</script>


<template>
    <iframe class="player" id="player__iframe"></iframe>
</template>


<style lang="scss">
    @import '@/styles/variables.scss';

    .player {
        background-size: cover;
        background-position: 50% 50%;
    }
</style>
